title: Build video streaming platform with user authentication, video upload, and social features

requirements.text: Implement user authentication system with Internet Identity integration for signup and login
acceptanceCriteria: Users can sign up using Internet Identity
Users can log in and maintain authenticated sessions
Authentication state persists across page reloads

requirements.text: Create user profile system with profile creation, editing, and viewing capabilities
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create and edit their profiles
Profiles display username, bio, and profile picture
Users can view other users' public profiles

requirements.text: Implement video upload functionality supporting MP4 and MOV formats with file validation and storage in backend
acceptanceCriteria: Users can upload MP4 and MOV video files
File type validation prevents unsupported formats
Uploaded videos are stored securely in the backend
Upload progress indicator shows during file transfer

requirements.text: Build video streaming interface with playback controls and video player component
acceptanceCriteria: Video player displays uploaded videos with standard controls (play, pause, seek, volume)
Videos stream smoothly from backend storage
Player is responsive and works on different screen sizes

requirements.text: Implement like system allowing users to like videos with like count display and toggle functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Users can like and unlike videos
Like count updates in real-time
Like state persists across sessions

requirements.text: Create comment system with comment creation, display, and deletion functionality for videos
acceptanceCriteria: Users can post comments on videos
Comments display with username and timestamp
Users can delete their own comments

requirements.text: Implement channel subscription system allowing users to subscribe to other users and view subscriber counts
acceptanceCriteria: Users can subscribe and unsubscribe from channels
Subscriber count displays on user profiles
Subscription status persists across sessions

requirements.text: Create video categorization system with predefined categories and category-based filtering
acceptanceCriteria: Videos can be assigned to categories during upload
Users can browse videos by category
Categories display with video counts

requirements.text: Implement search functionality with title and description matching for finding videos
acceptanceCriteria: Users can search videos by keywords
Search returns relevant results based on video titles and descriptions
Search results display in a grid layout

requirements.text: Build trending section displaying videos ranked by view count and engagement metrics
acceptanceCriteria: Trending page displays most viewed videos
Trending algorithm considers recent views and likes
Trending list updates periodically

requirements.text: Implement watch history system tracking videos viewed by each user with timestamp
acceptanceCriteria: System records videos watched by logged-in users
Users can view their watch history
Watch history displays with view timestamps

requirements.text: Create playlist creation and management system allowing users to organize videos into custom playlists
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create named playlists
Users can add and remove videos from playlists
Playlists display on user profiles

requirements.text: Build admin dashboard with user management, video moderation, and platform statistics
acceptanceCriteria: Admins can view all users and videos
Dashboard displays key metrics (total users, videos, views)
Admins have elevated permissions for content management

requirements.text: Implement content report system allowing users to flag inappropriate videos with report reasons
acceptanceCriteria: Users can report videos with specific reasons
Reports are submitted to admin review queue
Users cannot report the same video multiple times

requirements.text: Create content moderation system with admin review interface for reported videos and content removal capabilities
acceptanceCriteria: Admins can review reported content
Admins can remove or approve flagged videos
Moderation actions are logged

requirements.text: Design and implement a cohesive visual theme with modern, cinematic styling featuring dark backgrounds, gradient accents, and sleek typography optimized for video content presentation
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses dark backgrounds with contrasting accent colors
Typography is clean and readable for video metadata
Layout emphasizes video thumbnails and content discovery
Design is consistent across all pages

constraints: Backend must use single-actor Motoko architecture
Frontend must use React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query
Authentication must use Internet Identity only
All video storage must be handled through the Internet Computer backend
Do not implement external CDN integration, cloud hosting providers, or third-party video processing services
Do not implement AI features (auto captions, recommendations) that require external LLM or ML service integrations
Do not implement real-time live streaming features
Do not implement adaptive quality streaming (240p-4K) as it requires external video transcoding services
Do not implement video compression or thumbnail auto-generation that requires external processing services
Do not implement monetization systems involving external ad networks or payment processors beyond what is natively supported
Do not implement creator analytics that require external analytics services
nonGoals: Cloud hosting on AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure
Third-party AI service integrations for captions or recommendations
Real-time live streaming with WebSocket or Socket.io
Adaptive bitrate streaming with multiple quality levels
External video transcoding or compression services
External payment processor integration beyond native support
Social media API integrations for sharing
Advanced analytics dashboards with third-party services

Platform logo with modern video play symbol design (logo.dim_256x256.png)
Default user avatar placeholder with neutral profile silhouette (default-avatar.dim_200x200.png)
Video thumbnail placeholder with play icon overlay (video-placeholder.dim_640x360.png)
